description:
Product version:
OpenStack Nova 2011.1

Problem:
All euca-xxx command lines abort after a delay of more one minute when an HTTP proxy is defined by the http_proxy environment variable.

In example:
[root]# euca-describe-images
Warning: failed to parse error message from AWS: <unknown>:8:2: mismatched tag
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-images", line 171, in <module>
    main()
  File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-images", line 160, in main
    euca.display_error_and_exit('%s' % ex)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/euca2ools/__init__.py", line 1395, in display_error_and_exit
    dom = minidom.parseString(msg)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/minidom.py", line 1925, in parseString
    return expatbuilder.parseString(string)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/expatbuilder.py", line 942, in parseString
    return builder.parseString(string)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/expatbuilder.py", line 223, in parseString
    parser.Parse(string, True)
xml.parsers.expat.ExpatError: mismatched tag: line 1, column 217
title: OpenStack Nova doesn't support HTTP proxy

comments.content:
Product version:
OpenStack Nova 2011.1

Problem:
All euca-xxx command lines abort after a delay of more one minute when an HTTP proxy is defined by the http_proxy environment variable.

In example:
[root]# euca-describe-images
Warning: failed to parse error message from AWS: <unknown>:8:2: mismatched tag
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-images", line 171, in <module>
    main()
  File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-images", line 160, in main
    euca.display_error_and_exit('%s' % ex)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/euca2ools/__init__.py", line 1395, in display_error_and_exit
    dom = minidom.parseString(msg)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/minidom.py", line 1925, in parseString
    return expatbuilder.parseString(string)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/expatbuilder.py", line 942, in parseString
    return builder.parseString(string)
  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/site-packages/_xmlplus/dom/expatbuilder.py", line 223, in parseString
    parser.Parse(string, True)
xml.parsers.expat.ExpatError: mismatched tag: line 1, column 217
